劋字的基本解释

劋
jiǎo
讨伐，灭绝：“西劋桓歆，北殄索虏。”
砍；削：“数劋竹箭，伐檀柘。”

劋
chāo
古通“抄”，袭取，抄袭。

劋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
“剿1”的古字。同“剿1”。

劋字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　劋； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页144第43
【唐韻】【集韻】?子了切，音湫。絕也。又【集韻】子小切，焦上聲。【前漢·王莽傳】征伐劋絕之矣。【註】劋，截也。又【集韻】子皓切，音早。【揚子·方言】獪也。秦晉之閒曰獪，楚謂之劋。【正字通】與?同。

劋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
劋字的起名意思

暂无。

劋
Basic explanation of words
劋
jiǎo
Crusade, extinction: "Xishao Huanxian, Beixian captive."
Cut; Cut: "Count the bamboo arrows, cut the Tanzhe."
劋
chāo
Gutong "plagiarizes", imitates, and plagiarizes.
劋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
The ancient word "剿1". Same as "Suppress 1".
劋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　劋; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 144 43
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] It's a cut, Yin Qiu. Absolutely. [Ji Yun] Zi Xiaoqie, Jiao Shangsheng. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Conquering and conquering Mengjue. [Note] 劋, cut also. [Ji Yun] Zi Hao cut, the sound is early. 【Yangtze Dialect】Zuan Ye. In the Qin and Jin dynasties, it is called 狯, and the Chu is called 劋. 【Zhengzitong】Same as ?.
劋
